refnamediv.refpurpose: Writes the audio signal to a digital delay line.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Writes the audio signal to a digital delay line.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: delayw writes asig into the delay area established by the preceding delayr unit. Viewed as a pair, these two units permit the formation of modified feedback loops, etc. However, there is a lower bound on the value of idlt, which must be at least 1 control period (or 1/kr).
